channel.title: Helix World - Where the reality of Pking begins
channel.description:
[center] The Revival of Helix World | Where the reality of pking begins. [i][iurl=http://www.helix-world.org]Forums[/iurl] [iurl=#]Beta[/iurl][/i] [hr] [/center] [b]Helix-World[/b] [i]Helix-World was a very popular RuneScape Private Server around a year ago. Going from 50 players to 600+ players within 3 months, it was a massive fright to the higher up RSPS. After reaching the 632 player peak of Helix-World, Ruby hired a developer. This developer proceeded to slowly ruin Helix-World, until they were reduced to around 200 players. Through boredom and being fed-up, Ruby shut helix-world down.[/i] [b]Why are you reinstating it?[/b] [i]We are reinstating it because we feel it never ended correctly. This time Helix-World will be open for good and there will be no half-assed doing of it. We will be reverting back to our 474 days, with of course, that infamous Project Insanity source. [/i] [b]Who's on the team?[/b] [i]Our team this time isn't simply just Ruby and his moderators, we have respected developers. Owner - Helix(Ruby). Developers - Scape-JAVA, Rix_, Omer, wildskiller. Head moderator (Only one!) - Soulcist Moderators - None as of yet, but will need a few in the next couple of days. [/i] [b]What are your plans?[/b] [i]We plan to reinstate helix-world in it's fullest. Sadly, after I shut it down I wiped the server and client from my hard drive to prevent me from doing exactly this. So we're recreating it from a regular PI base. Scape-JAVA, Rix_, Myself and Omer are working on this server day and night so that it can be released within the next week or two.[/i] [hr] [center] [b]Development Log[/b] [/center]
12 August 2012 - Whole Team - Project Reinstated and Developers recruited. 12 August 2012 - Ruby - Webhost and new domain purchased 12 August 2012 - Scape-JAVA - Fixed a conflicting issue with netty/mina 13 August 2012 - Scape-JAVA - NPC handling via SQL is being written 13 August 2012 - Scape-JAVA - Wrote a database connector 12 August 2012 - Scape-JAVA - Fixed a minor bug with combat
[hr] [center] [b]Media[/b] [i] Media coming soon. [/i] [/center] [hr] Keep checking back on here to see our progress, and don't forget, [iurl=http://www.helix-world.org]register on our forums[/iurl] when our link has been approved! Best Regards, Helix-World Development Team.

@dclawed wrote:

I remember when you were 3rd on toplist, I once played Helix-World, then forgot about it, I would love to me a moderator or head mod, I am really active etc, I could help out and advertise, trust me I could really help you guys out, I would love to have a chance, I have lots of experience, also I could make guides out etc. I will make a forum account and might play this game soon!

item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:50, topic:454088”][quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=556961.msg4078517#msg4078517 date=1345122638]
Setting up a repo takes literally seconds. Add the directory to files > sync files. Done.
[/quote]
If they made git bash more user friendly I’d take the time to learn it. That’s just my personal feel on it. Command line is so early 2000’s.[/quote]

It is way more user friendly than it was, check it out sometime!
